paper.title: Volatility forecasting for low-volatility portfolio selection in the US and the Korean equity markets
paper.abstract: We consider the problem of low-volatility portfolio selection which has been the subject of extensive research in the field of portfolio selection. To improve the currently existing techniques that rely purely on past information to select low-volatility portfolios, this paper investigates the use of time series regression techniques that make forecasts of future volatility to select the portfolios. In particular, for the first time, the utility of support vector regression and its enhancements as portfolio selection techniques is provided. It is shown that our regression-based portfolio selection provides attractive outperformances compared to the benchmark index and the portfolio defined by a well-known strategy on the data-sets of the S&P 500 and the KOSPI 200.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心研究内容是低波动性投资组合的选择，通过时间序列回归技术预测未来波动性来优化投资组合。这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴，论文中提到的S&P 500和KOSPI 200数据集的应用也进一步证实了这一点。
